text: Johnny Rivers (born John Ramistella on November 7, 1942 in New York City) is an American rock and roll musician. He grew up in Louisiana. He was popular in the 1960s and 1970s for his songs like "Secret Agent Man", "The Poor Side of Town", "Baby I Need Your Lovin", "The Midnight Special", and "Swayin' To The Music (Slow Dancin')". == Other websites == * Official website Category:American rock musicians Category:American rock singers Category:Singer-songwriters from New York (state) Category:Singers from New York City Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Musicians from Louisiana Category:1942 births Category:Living people
title: Johnny Rivers
